General.Name: Focus Lightings Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Focus Lightings Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of compound optoelectronic semiconductor materials in China and internationally. It offers LED epitaxial wafers and chips used for display backlighting, general lighting, and medical beauty applications. The company also provides lighting, display, and optoelectronic devices; and contract energy management services. In addition, it leases non-resident real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Jucan Optoelectronics Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. Focus Lightings Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
